timeline.title: Timeline
timeline.2016: After I finished my VMBO-TL I was bored in the vacation and I started developing static HTML and CSS sites. Later on I started with my teachers assistant education at the KW1C in 's-Hertogenbosch.
timeline.2019: I started learning Java alongside MySQL to build Minecraft plugins as a hobby.
timeline.2020: This year I finished my teachers assistant education and started with the eduction of becoming I primary school teacher at the Fontys Hogeschool in Eindhoven.
timeline.2022: I decided to quite my current education and start with Informatica at Avans Hogeschool in 's-Hertogenbosch.
